title.rendered: List of TOP Blockchain Development Companies

content.rendered:
As we step into 2024, the landscape of blockchain development is more dynamic and innovative than ever before. Whether you’re a startup looking to launch a new hype project or an established enterprise aiming to integrate blockchain technology into your existing processes, the importance of partnering with a top-notch blockchain development company cannot be overstated.

To help you navigate this issue, we’ve compiled a list of the Top 10 Blockchain Development Companies for 2023. These companies are not just leaders in the field; they are innovators, each bringing unique solutions to the market. 

Today, we’ll share the list of the top blockchain development companies to hire for your business. Please note that this is not advice of any kind, and you should still do your own research before selecting any of these (or other) enterprise blockchain development firms.

Here’s the list of the companies we’ll review:

  • IdeaSoft
  • Blaize
  • Innowise
  • EvaCodes
  • 4irelabs
  • Unicsoft
  • Infograins
  • Apriorit
  • Cubix 
  • 4soft

So why should you pay attention to our compilation of the best blockchain development companies instead of others? 

As a leading blockchain development company itself, Blaize has all the required knowledge and expertise to assess the situation in the market and choose the most efficient solutions. Our specialists have 6+ years of experience working on leading blockchain projects such as Mysten Labs, Web3 Foundation, StarkDefi, and much more. Besides, we have designed and deployed a few of our products, including DeHive, and have taken care of their full protocol security.

We are sure that this qualifies us to work on the list and will help you choose the most suitable contractor. So off we go!

Top 10 Blockchain Software Development Companies

Without further ado, let us present to you the top-notch blockchain development companies in the business.

IdeaSoft

IdeaSoft is a top-rated blockchain development company that deals with various requests, including the ones for blockchain-related projects.

Established in 2016, IdeaSoft has quickly gathered a team of 200+ developers distributed over 12 countries worldwide. These specialists helped the agency successfully complete 250+ projects.

In 2021, the company became a part of Sigma Software Group, a Swedish software development and IT consulting company with over 1,150 specialists in Ukraine and deep expertise in Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, IT Security, AR/VR, Embedded and IoT, and other directions.

IdeaSoft is registered in Portugal with offices in Norway, the Czech Republic, Israel, and Estonia. Yet, the company has Ukrainian roots, and most of the team members are from Ukraine.

Website: https://ideasoft.io/ 

Blaize

Founded in 2016, Blaize is one of the leading blockchain development agencies in the market that got recognized as a top blockchain developer. 

The company covers all areas of blockchain and crypto development, including projects in DeFi (decentralized exchanges and dApps), NFT-related products (marketplaces, games, collections, etc.), blockchain ecosystems, protocols, and smart contracts.

On top of that, Blaize provides other services:

  • Smart contract audits
  • Custom blockchain development
  • Tailor-made enterprise solutions
  • Consulting and much more

At the moment, Blaize has 65+ highly expertized developers who can be hired as solo specialists or as a team. The agency has completed over 130 successful projects in different areas of blockchain development, including solutions for Decimated, Radiologex, Celo, and Solana.

Blaize is a Ukrainian company with most employees based in Ukraine.

Website: https://blaize.tech/ 

INNOWISE

Since its inception in 2007, Innowise has emerged as a prominent player in the global software development arena, with a particular focus on blockchain technology. With over 1500 skilled IT professionals, the company has been instrumental in propelling businesses forward by leveraging its expertise in blockchain development and other software solutions.

Innowise’s diverse range of services includes custom software development, UI/UX design, and IT consulting. They have successfully executed over 850 projects across various industries, with a significant number of them in the blockchain domain, catering to sectors like FinTech and eCommerce. Known for its commitment to quality and innovation, Innowise operates globally ready to tackle complex challenges in the ever-evolving world of blockchain technology

Headquartered in Warszawa, Poland, Innowise has established a global presence with offices located in key cities around the world.

Website: https://innowise.com/

EvaCodes

EvaCodes is one of the top-rated blockchain development companies on Clutch. It is a full-stack custom software development firm that creates web and mobile solutions, has a dedicated team and a whole R&D office.

Even though EvaCodes was only established in 2019, the team has already completed 150+ projects in different fields like DeFi, NFT, and GameFi.

The company is based in Ukraine.

Website: https://evacodes.com/ 

4irelabs

Created in 2010, 4irelabs has surely become one of the well-known companies that develop blockchain solutions. This is one of the first companies developing a blockchain, that started working in this sector of the IT industry.

On top of working for clients worldwide, the team has deployed an array of their own branded white-label products serving crowdfunding, private chains, and other applications of blockchain technology.

The agency has completed over 200 projects so far and hired 150 developers to the team.

4irelabs is a Swedish-Ukrainian company with most of the team situated in Ukraine.

Website: https://4irelabs.com/ 

Unicsoft

Unicsoft is a technology consulting company that delivers blockchain and AI/ML solutions for startups and enterprises. The team has expertise in DeFi, NFT, GameFi, KYC/AML, smart contract development and audit, machine learning, Artificial Intelligence, data analytics, image recognition, computer vision, natural language processing, MLOps, cloud computing, and IoT.

Established in 2005, Unicsoft has gained one of the largest pools of clients, building its reputation year by year. 

Unicsoft helps startups validate ideas, build an MVP, iterate towards reaching product-market fit, and scale fast. For enterprises, they provide technology consulting and development to drive business performance. Yet, the company does not have a narrow specialization – Unicsoft experts work in many industries, not only blockchain.

The company is registered in the USA, but the team is mostly based in Ukraine.

Website: https://unicsoft.com/ 

INFOGRAINS

InfoGrains, a dynamic company with a team of over 200 professionals, is rapidly growing each day. Their diverse team includes a fully staffed blockchain R&D department, creative content writers, expert marketers, skilled engineers, and compassionate delivery heads. Known for building a technical powerhouse, InfoGrains has earned the loyalty and repeated business of its clients, catering to various company sizes and industries. They have provided solutions like supply chain automation systems and blockchain solutions across multiple sectors. Their 50+ member Blockchain development team is dedicated to helping clients succeed.

InfoGrains, established in 2011, is committed to excellence, leveraging cutting-edge technology for unparalleled client satisfaction, breakthrough advancements, and faster time-to-market. The company comprises distinguished experts who collaborate closely with industry leaders in various domains, including Employee Benefits, Healthcare, E-commerce, IoT, AI, IT Consulting services, Custom Software Development, and more.

The company has offices in the USA, the UK, Australia and India.

Website: https://www.infograins.com/

Apriorit

Apriorit is a software engineering company that helps tech enterprises and startups worldwide with building custom software solutions, upgrading legacy products, configuring and maintaining cloud environments, and more.

Established in 2002, the company has worked in many areas, including blockchain, AI and machine learning, cloud-based solutions, cybersecurity, IoT, etc.

Currently, Apriorit has over 350 employees who are distributed in 15 development and 6 QA teams. The firm has completed 650+ projects and gained clients from 15 countries all over the world.

The company’s headquarters is in the US, but the majority of developers are from Ukraine.

Website: https://www.apriorit.com/ 

Cubix

Founded in 2008, Cubix has gained a lot of experience working with worldwide clients on mobile apps, games, and enterprise software. 

The company specializes in blockchain development, customization and integration of complex enterprise-level solutions, business intelligence analytics, advanced web and mobile solutions. Now, the sphere of expertise of the Cubix team also includes blockchain, e-learning, IoT, AI, machine learning, SaaS, AR, and VR. 

Cubix has 250+ employees who have completed over 1,200 projects over the years.

The company is registered in the USA, with offices in the US, Pakistan, and Dubai.

Website: https://www.cubix.co/ 

4SOFT

4Soft is a tech company that specializes in Blockchain and End-to-End Software Development. Since its founding in 2013, 4Soft has established itself as one of the best blockchain developers and a reliable partner in the software development industry, offering more than just code writing. They focus on understanding client needs, providing the best approach to these needs, and then implementing accurate technical solutions.

Since 2015, their portfolio has expanded to include digital transformation, data processing, artificial intelligence projects, and custom software development. 4Soft offers expertise in areas like Blockchain, Digital Transformation, Data Processing and Artificial Intelligence, and Custom Software Development. 

They have worked with industries like Financial Services, Business Services, eCommerce, Healthcare, Telecommunications, Transportation, Arts, and Manufacturing. Their market reach includes the USA, United Kingdom, the Nordics region, Dubai, Singapore, Australia, Switzerland, Germany, Italy, Czech Republic, and Poland.

Website: https://www.4soft.co/ 

How to Choose The Right Blockchain Technology Company

If you are choosing between several blockchain software development companies and having a tough time, take a step back, relax, and try to make things a bit more clear for yourself. This is especially crucial if you have never outsourced the development process to a third party.

So, first of all, what you’d wanna do is create a list of the fundamental details of your project. It should include the following:

  • the main idea of your project
  • the problem your project solves
  • Its competitive advantages – why it is better than other existing solutions 
  • any suggestions for the preferable concept and blockchain frameworks

We recommend clarifying all this information before scheduling calls with potential contractors and even before doing research. This way, you will not waste your time and will get right to what you’re looking for.

If you have no idea about blockchain frameworks to be used, think through the functionality of your project and any future collaborations. This information should be enough for professional companies developing blockchain solutions to recommend you the required tech stack.

Next, you have two options: to create a blockchain solution from scratch or fork one of the existing chains. We have covered this topic in one of our previous articles, so make sure to look it through: How to Choose a Reliable Blockchain Company for Your Project?

Here’s a brief list of the factors to check before hiring a blockchain partner:

  • Competency and expertise (through experience, case studies, documentation, etc.)
  • Team creativity and flexibility
  • Pricing types and engagement models
  • Dev team communication skills and desire to collaborate
  • C-level authority and reputation

There are also a few red flags to look for in cryptocurrency development companies, so make sure to check them out in the article we mentioned before.

product owners, get feedback, and make amendments. Make sure you are on the same page about the workflow and your collaboration, and only after that proceed to discuss the budget and other matters.

Why Should You Turn to Blaize for Blockchain Software Development?

Blaize is one of the leading blockchain development companies with plenty of expertise and an impressive track record. Our company has been working on secure blockchain solutions for over 5 years and has completed 70+ projects in different areas, including DeFi, NFT, GameFi, blockchain protocols, integrations, and smart contracts.

Over the years, we have gathered 65+ highly-qualified blockchain and GameFi developers with narrow specializations and great communication skills. On top of that, our team has professional project managers and data analysts who will make our collaboration even more productive and help you optimize the product you build.

Another essential factor is our flexibility. Blaize has a few engagement models, which allow you to hire just one specialist or the entire team, depending on your needs. Besides, you can ask for consulting services, product maintenance after the launch, and multiple security services like smart contract audits.

When it comes to Blaize, you don’t just hire a bunch of developers for a job – you get a reliable partner that will cover all your needs and will be ready to go the extra mile to make your product stand out in the market.

So if you feel like this is something you are looking for, contact our team to get all the details and discuss our collaboration.

Final Thoughts

Outsourced blockchain development is an effective solution for those who are looking for low-maintenance, high-quality specialists for a reasonable price. If you don’t feel like spending months gathering a worthy in-house team, find a reputable agency that will cover all your development needs.

When it comes to reputable blockchain technology companies, Blaize is one of the most evident choices. We are an experienced team of blockchain developers who will make sure that your product is highly secure, works well, and follows best industry standards. Contact our team to find out more about our services and clarify the pricing for your scope of work.

Frequently Asked Questions

What do blockchain development companies do?

Such companies create blockchain-based software solutions for other businesses worldwide. This includes projects in DeFi, NFT, GameFi, standalone blockchain protocols, smart contracts, and more.

How to find a blockchain development agency?

To find a reliable blockchain development company, you should do prior research, study reviews online, check case studies, and the overall reputation of the candidates. Some trustworthy options are gathered in this article.

What are some blockchain development companies?

Here’s a list of a few blockchain development agencies:

  • Blaize
  • Innowise
  • EvaCodes
  • 4irelabs
  • Unicsoft
  • Infograins
  • Apriorit
  • Cubix 
  • 4soft
  • IdeaSoft

Learn more about them in the full article.

How do I choose a blockchain development company?

To choose a reliable contractor, make sure to learn more about the company online, look through reviews and case studies. Besides, don’t hesitate to ask a lot of questions during the interview to understand whether the company’s workflow and communication style fits your business.
